Interface FavoriteRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<FavoriteEntity, Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<FavoriteEntity, Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<FavoriteEntity, Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<FavoriteEntity, Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<FavoriteEntity, Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<FavoriteEntity>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<FavoriteEntity, Long>
@Repository public interface FavoriteRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<FavoriteEntity, Long>

  • Method Details

    • findByUserAndListing

      Optional<FavoriteEntity> findByUserAndListing(UserEntity user, ListingEntity listing)
      Find favorite by user and listing

    • findByUserIdAndListingId

      @Query("SELECT f FROM FavoriteEntity f WHERE f.user.id = :userId AND f.listing.id = :listingId") Optional<FavoriteEntity> findByUserIdAndListingId(@Param("userId") Long userId, @Param("listingId") String listingId)
      Find favorite by user ID and listing ID

    • findByUserIdWithDetails

      @Query("SELECT f FROM FavoriteEntity f JOIN FETCH f.listing l JOIN FETCH l.creator LEFT JOIN FETCH l.listingItems li LEFT JOIN FETCH li.item WHERE f.user.id = :userId ORDER BY f.createdAt DESC") List<FavoriteEntity> findByUserIdWithDetails(@Param("userId") Long userId)
      Get all favorites for a user with listing details

    • findByUserIdOrderByCreatedAtDesc

      org.springframework.data.domain.Page<FavoriteEntity> findByUserIdOrderByCreatedAtDesc(Long userId, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Get paginated favorites for a user

    • findListingIdsByUserId

      @Query("SELECT f.listing.id FROM FavoriteEntity f WHERE f.user.id = :userId") List<String> findListingIdsByUserId(@Param("userId") Long userId)
      Get all favorite listing IDs for a user

    • existsByUserIdAndListingId

      boolean existsByUserIdAndListingId(Long userId, String listingId)
      Check if user has favorited a listing

      Count favorites for a listing

    • countByUserId

      long countByUserId(Long userId)
      Count total favorites for a user

    • deleteByUserIdAndListingId

      void deleteByUserIdAndListingId(Long userId, String listingId)
      Delete favorite by user and listing IDs

    • findMostFavoritedListings

      @Query("SELECT f.listing.id, COUNT(f) as favoriteCount FROM FavoriteEntity f GROUP BY f.listing.id ORDER BY favoriteCount DESC") List<Object[]> findMostFavoritedListings(org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Get most favorited listings
